alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Monroe; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 1:18PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ORLEANS...GENESEE... MONROE...NIAGARA...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band accompanied by winds of up to 70 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to near zero. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 115 PM EST, a lake effect snow band was across much of Northern Erie County, and extending north into at least the southern to central portions of Niagara County. The band continues into far northwest portions of Genesee and Monroe counties, as well as much of Orleans County. This band should remain stationary or move a few miles north through 330 PM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, Niagara Falls, West Seneca, North Tonawanda, Clarence, Lockport, Lackawanna, Kenmore, Depew, Amherst, Tonawanda, Lancaster, Brockport, Medina, Albion, Hilton, Williamsville, Hamlin Beach State Park and Grand Island. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 48A and 54.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Monroe; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans
